rules.title: Confirm Patient Status
rules.action: Confirm if the patient is new or existing.
rules.example: Are you a new or existing patient with us?

rules.title: Identify Insurance Plan Type
rules.example: Is your plan PPO or HMO?

rules.title: Assist with Plan Type Identification
rules.condition: Patient is unsure about the plan type (PPO/HMO).
rules.action: Attempt to help identify the plan or state non-contracted plans.
rules.example: No worries, we can help check for you. Which insurance provider do you have? Please note we might not be contracted with all HMO plans.

rules.title: Request Preferred Appointment Time (PPO)
rules.action: Inquire about the patient's preferred appointment time.
rules.example: Great, what day and time works best for your appointment?

rules.title: Determine Appointment Urgency/Nature
rules.condition: No preferred appointment time is specified OR customer asks about general availability.
rules.action: Inquire about the nature of their visit, discomfort, or urgency.
rules.example: To help us find the best slot, could you tell me the reason for your visit, and if you're experiencing any discomfort or urgency?

rules.title: Explain New Patient Routine Visit Procedure
rules.condition: A new patient requests a routine check-up and confirms no immediate concerns.
rules.action: Explain the typical procedure for the initial appointment, including services provided (e.g., exam, X-rays, cleaning) and the process for subsequent appointments based on diagnosis.
rules.example: For your first visit, as a new patient, we typically start with a comprehensive exam, necessary X-rays, and a professional cleaning. Afterwards, the dentist will discuss any findings and recommend next steps for any future treatments.

rules.title: Acknowledge Customer Responses
rules.example: Understood, thank you for letting me know.
